mapper.sql:
FROM share c WHERE 1=1
AND food_div = #{shValue} AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND people_num = #{shValue} AND place LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND price LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT c.seq ,c.food_div ,c.title ,c.people_num ,c.info ,c.place ,c.time ,c.price ,c.DelNy ,c.createDate
ORDER BY c.seq DESC
SELECT c.seq ,c.food_div ,c.title ,c.people_num ,c.info ,c.place ,c.time ,c.price ,c.DelNy ,c.createDate ,f.likeNy FROM share c JOIN favorite f on f.shareSeq = c.seq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY c.seq DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share c WHERE 1=1 and share_member_seq = #{seq} ORDER BY c.createDate DESC

SELECT likeSeq ,memberSEq ,shareSeq ,likeNy
FROM favorite where 1=1 and memberSeq = #{memberSeq} and shareSeq = #{seq}
SELECT c.seq ,c.food_div ,c.title ,c.people_num ,c.info ,c.place ,c.time ,c.price ,c.DelNy ,c.createDate FROM share c WHERE 1=1 AND c.seq = #{seq}

SELECT c.seq ,c.food_div ,c.title ,c.people_num ,c.info ,c.place ,c.time ,c.price ,c.DelNy ,c.createDate
ORDER BY c.seq DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM share c WHERE 1=1 and DATE(createDate) = DATE(now())

SELECT c.food_div ,c.title ,c.people_num ,c.info ,c.place ,c.time ,c.price ,c.DelNy ,c.createDate FROM share c WHERE 1=1 and DATE(createDate) = DATE(now()) ORDER BY c.seq DESC
) a limit 6 offset #{startRnumForMysql}
